name: Hidden places of Paris center
description: I offer you the possibility to visit the well-know "Quartier Latin" and "Le Marais" in another way that the classical tours do. We'll evite the main "touristic area" of Saint Michel and we'll reach less touristic places. As a person that's been living in this quarter and that loves degustations, I'll show you the best places to eat and to drink. I'll add to this a bit of sightseeing (Panthéon, Notre Dame, City Hall) and cultural tips (best cinemas, galleries).
